snippet: The standoff between the league and the players union seemed to harden, and the cancellation of the first two weeks of the regular season now seems inevitable.
lead_paragraph: The standoff between the league and the players union seemed to harden, and the cancellation of the first two weeks of the regular season now seems inevitable.

headline.main: Rift Deepens as N.B.A. Draws Line on Compensation
headline.print_headline: Rift Deepens as N.B.A. Draws Line on Compensation
headline.seo: N.B.A. Sets Condition for Resumption of Labor Talks
